entry.title: https://github.com/KhronosGroup/SPIRV-Cross
entry.content: SPIRV-Cross is a practical tool and library for performing reflection on SPIR-V and disassembling SPIR-V back to high level languages.

entry.title: https://github.com/Open4Es/Open4Es-Shader-Android
entry.content: This is a shader can running on Minecraft Java Edition For Phone project which uses GL4ES. This repository contains source code for Android platform.

entry.title: https://github.com/SaschaWillems/Vulkan
entry.content: C++ examples for the Vulkan graphics API

entry.title: https://github.com/Septonious/Solas-Shader
entry.content: A good performing fantasy stylised shaderpack with fancy visuals!

entry.title: https://github.com/X0nk/Bliss-Shader
entry.content: A minecraft shader which is an edit of chocapic v9

entry.title: https://github.com/cizia64/CrossMix-OS
entry.content: Enhanced OS for the TrimUI Smart Pro

entry.title: https://github.com/javiergcim/MakeUpUltraFast
entry.content: High performance Minecraft shader (Java). For a graphical enhancement. Intended for low-spec computers.

entry.title: https://github.com/libretro/glsl-shaders
entry.content: This repo is for glsl shaders converted by hand from libretro's common-shaders repo, since some don't play nicely with the cg2glsl script.

entry.title: https://github.com/sixthsurge/photon
entry.content: A gameplay-focused shader pack for Minecraft
